document.full_text: the dollar rebounded from three-year lows and u.s. crude slid more than 1 percent on monday after news al qaeda leader osama bin laden was killed in a firefight with u.s. forces reduced the perception of security risks facing the united states.
document.title: dollar rises, oil slides after news of bin laden's death
lines_and_colors: the dollar rebounded from three-year lows and u.s. crude slid more than 1 percent on monday after news al qaeda leader osama bin laden was killed in a firefight with u.s. forces reduced the perception of security risks facing the united states.
